Testing Feedback: The Admin Dashboard component has been tested and found to be working well with minor issues. The UI is not responsive and the data is not correctly retrieved from the backend. However, some bugs were identified and reported, such as the missing admin image and the use of static data. The fixes for these bugs have been identified and will be implemented in the next iteration.
Performance: Good, but there is scope for improving the quality of the code.
